Class MatrixGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • MatrixGUI

  • public class MatrixGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    This class has most of the methods used to create a table and an array with the values inserted into the table.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Paarth Garg
